name: Working With RPG: Getting the cure
name_original: Working With RPG: Getting the cure
description:
Finding the cure is easy, but in today worlds getting the cure is difficult. With this all new Working With Role Playing Game Story.

Features: 

> All new Characters and Story made for the Finding the Cure Game Jam separate from the main Working With RPG Story.

> A very short story about the NPC and the Anti-Patch Cult.

This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, organization, events and incidents are the products of the author’s imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.
